name: Dungeon Dressing
description: Details, decorations, and detritus to make empty dungeon rooms interesting. Roll once or twice per room!

entries.result: Cobwebs thick enough to slow movement in the corners
A skeleton slumped against the wall, no obvious cause of death
Scratches on the walls, possibly claw marks or tally marks
A broken weapon on the ground (rusted and useless)
Faded mural on one wall, subject barely recognizable
A cold breeze from no apparent source
Moss or fungus growing in patches on the walls
Water dripping from the ceiling into a puddle
An old campfire, cold for days or weeks
Scattered bones, too broken to identify the creature
Chains hanging from the wall, manacles open
A broken chair and table, signs of a struggle
Footprints in the dust leading in a different direction
A torn piece of cloth caught on a stone
Strange symbols scratched into the floor
The smell of something rotting nearby
A pile of refuse and debris in one corner
Bloodstains, old and dried brown
A rat scurries away as you enter
An empty torch sconce, recently used
Graffiti in Common: a crude insult or warning
A discarded backpack, empty and torn
Cracks in the ceiling, debris on the floor below
A large spider web (no spider visible... yet)
An overturned barrel, contents long gone
The floor slopes noticeably downward
A stone door, jammed open and immovable
Faint sounds echoing from deeper within
A small shrine to an unknown deity, offerings rotted
Arrow or crossbow bolt embedded in the wall
A child's toy (unsettling in this context)
Burn marks on walls and floor from an old fire
A rope hanging from a hole in the ceiling
Empty potion bottles, labels illegible
A mirror, cracked but still reflective
The faint smell of incense or perfume
A sleeping roll and personal effects, owner absent
Mushrooms growing in a ring pattern (fairy ring?)
A statue of a warrior, face worn away
Iron spikes driven into the wall for climbing
A coded message carved into a stone block
Dramatic claw marks gouged into a door
A well or cistern, depth unknown
Luminescent lichen providing dim light
A half-finished map drawn on parchment
A cage, door open, large enough for a person
Words written in blood (still wet): 'TURN BACK'
A weapon stuck in the ceiling, just out of reach
An arcane circle on the floor, partially scuffed
A fresh corpse of an adventurer, still warm
Roll twice. Both are present and somehow connected.
